subject: Re: [junit] Having problem with Test Suite - Will you please help me
msgSnippet: Try this one ... below import junit.framework.*; public class AllTest extends TestCase { public static void main(String[] args) { /* * This line is commented
messageBody:
Try this one ... below

import junit.framework.*;

public class AllTest extends TestCase {

public static void main(String[] args) {

/*
* This line is commented as ... when you call run
passing AllTestClass, Junit will try to
* run testxxxx() in this class, but you dont have
any in this class so.. it complain no test method
* found. By addding a testXXXX() you will see that
this program run without any problem...and test
* the new test method added....
*/
//junit.textui.TestRunner.run(new
TestSuite(AllTest.class));

//so, If you want to run the Suite, then you would
better do this .. I suppose

junit.textui.TestRunner.run(Suite());


}

public static Test Suite()
{

TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();

suite.addTest(new TestSuite(AccountJUTest.class));
suite.addTest(new TestSuite(TestGame.class));

return suite;
}

} // End of class
